boardgame.name: The Captain Is Dead
boardgame.description: Imagine that you are one of the crew in your favorite science fiction TV show. Now imagine that in the last 10 minutes of the show things have gone so badly that the captain is dead and you and the surviving members of your crew have to pull together and save the day yourselves!_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;The Captain Is Dead is a co-op game for 2 to 7 players. All you have to do is get the ship's engines (aka _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;Jump Core_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;) back online and you win, but because there is a hostile alien ship trying to destroy you, that is easier said than done._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;You have an impressive star ship full of useful systems that will help you fend off the aliens, and get the Jump Core back online. Each system gives you an advantage while it remains online. The assault from the hostile alien ship tends to keep knocking those systems offline however. So you need to balance your time between keeping the ships system's online, fending off the alien threat, and completing your objective._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Each member of your crew has special abilities and skills. You need to work as a group to maximize the potential of each role. If someone tries to be a hero, you'll all die._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;

result.value: Some necessary text - easily memorized or small crib sheet
Moderate in-game text - needs crib sheet or paste ups
Extensive use of text - massive conversion needed to be playable

listing.notes: Kickstarter Edition, like new.

Game has been played only a couple of times. The pawns for the game are the non-descript avatar pawns as opposed to the stickered character pawns. Shipping will be USPS and calculated based on buyer_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s address. Buyer is responsible for all shipping fees. Game will be shipped within 3 days of receiving payment. Local pickup available for Baltimore area buyers.
I am selling my still-sealed Kickstarter copy of The Captain Is Dead. Will ship within the US only. Paypal accepted, along with Amazon Gift Cards.
